column1: Unemployment rate over time (2005 Q3 - 2023 Q3)

Note: The unemployment rate is the proportion of the economically active population who are classed as unemployed. All aged 16 or older are included. Data points represent a year of survey responses up to Q3 of the year stated. `Start of COVID-19 pandemic` is marked on the chart to highlight the first data point after or including March 2020.
Data source: Annual Population Survey, ONS via NOMIS
London's Poverty Profile is created by charitable funder Trust for London, and economic and public policy consultancy, WPI Economics
